scenario: I want to reduce my carbon footprint. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user switch to using public transportation or carpooling
Suggest that the user continue driving their own car
Suggest that the user buy a new gas-guzzling SUV
Suggest that the user take a flight for a short distance
Suggest that the user increase their energy consumption
adapt_outcome: The user has already switched to using public transportation or carpooling.

scenario: I want to reduce plastic waste. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user use reusable shopping bags
Suggest that the user continue using single-use plastic bags
Suggest that the user buy more plastic products
Suggest that the user throw plastic waste in the ocean
Suggest that the user ignore plastic waste
adapt_outcome: The user has already started using reusable shopping bags.

scenario: I want to conserve water. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user fix any leaking faucets or pipes
Suggest that the user leave the faucets running all the time
Suggest that the user take longer showers
Suggest that the user water their garden excessively
Suggest that the user waste water
adapt_outcome: The user has already fixed any leaking faucets or pipes.

scenario: I want to reduce food waste. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user plan meals and buy only what they need
Suggest that the user buy excessive amounts of food
Suggest that the user throw away leftovers
Suggest that the user leave the refrigerator door open
Suggest that the user ignore food waste
adapt_outcome: The user has already started planning meals and buying only what they need.

scenario: I want to reduce energy consumption. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user turn off lights and appliances when not in use
Suggest that the user keep lights and appliances on all the time
Suggest that the user buy energy-intensive appliances
Suggest that the user leave the air conditioner running all day
Suggest that the user increase their energy consumption
adapt_outcome: The user has already started turning off lights and appliances when not in use.

Suggest that the user waste energy
Suggest that the user use more fossil fuels
Suggest that the user ignore renewable energy

scenario: I want to reduce air pollution. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user use public transportation or walk instead of driving
Suggest that the user continue driving a high-emission vehicle
Suggest that the user burn more fossil fuels
Suggest that the user start an open fire in their backyard
Suggest that the user ignore air pollution
adapt_outcome: The user has already started using public transportation or walking instead of driving.

Suggest that the user make excessive noise
